pv15:8.2: taṁ hi okiriṁ → taṁ vikīrihaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv15:21.1: gharā tā ca dāsiyo → te gharadāsiyo āsuṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); te ghare dāsiyo ceva (mr)
pv15:11.2: tyāhaṁ → kiṁ tāhaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); kiṁ tyāhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); kiṁ vatāhaṁ (mr)
pv15:24.2: tedha → kiṁ vā ca te (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); kiṁ vidha te (mr)
